a.span: Crest Ridge Dolly Parton Imagination Library

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Crest Ridge FFA Chapter won the State Bronze Emblem Chapter yesterday. First time in chapter history! Great work members! Here is the link to the announcement: https://youtu.be/2Msrsa6Es_c

Attention 2020 Seniors: We know it is a rainy Friday so what better time to send a picture to lheishman@crestridge.org for your senior sign and complete your Spring Senior athletic google form. Thanks everyone!
Ag Club for Cougar Club Secondary is canceled 4/24.

FFA Plant Sale Update: SOLD OUT! Thanks to everyone with the overwhelming response for the plant sale. We are sold out! Everyone who ordered items should have received their order confirmation today. If you did not let Mr. Deevers know!

h3.a: K-12 Students - Online Opportunities Through UCM

div.p: Dear Parents, We get it...you are trying to teach your kids, do your job, and not get sick. What was originally two weeks could now be three months. To help we have teamed......
Access the link below for important information on transitioning to HS. If you have questions contact Mrs. Shelton or Mr. Frank (jshelton@crestridge.org,......

Crest Ridge
92 NW 58 HWY
Centerview, MO 64019
Ph 660-656-3316
